standard_metadata.standard_description: Interpret division of a whole number by a unit fraction, and compute such quotients.
standard_metadata.standard_title: Dividing whole numbers by unit fractions

hints.content: Imagine we have $\blueD{2}$ objects and divide them each into pieces $\dfrac{1}{2}$ of the size.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: Two circles. Each circle is divided into two equal-sized parts. Each part is labeled one-half. All parts are shaded.

hints.content: Imagine we have $\blueD{2}$ objects and divide them each into pieces $\dfrac{1}{9}$ of the size.   [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: Two circles. Each circle is divided into nine equal-sized parts. Each part is labeled one-ninth. All parts are shaded.
